maximum member of time-ranges per system

Time-Range CSC shall periodically update the status of each time-range every N seconds. (N is defined in TIME_RANGE_TYPE_TIMER_INTERVAL_SEC). Default is 50 seconds.
Notes: auto will wait 2 x Time_Range_Reflash_Time seconds to wait DUT update status in scripts.
